Hello. When you insert your lg g3. Go to your control panel and hardware and sound. Device Manager. Look for for the lg g3. And install this http://androiddrivers.net/lg-android-drivers/download-lg-g3-drivers/

I don't think it's the right stuff you got. The lg3 has built in sensor to connect to the wireless charger. So putting the sticker from the product you have..might interfere with the receiver.. Try to use it with out the sticker. Sorry for my bad English
